How to encrypts files or directories with EncFS ?
This tutorial with show you how to encrypts files with EncFS, using an arbitrary directory as storage for the encrypted files.
1) Install Encfs sudo apt-get install encfs
2) Create and encrypt directory encfs /home/$USER/.safe/ /home/$USER/open_safe/
3) Use : "mount" encfs /home/$USER/.safe/ /home/$USER/open_safe/
4) "unmount" fusermount -u /home/$USER/open_safe
5) Change passphrase encfsctl passwd /etc/ldapscripts/.secured
